name: FooterCard
description: Minimalist footer with card wrapper containing logo, divider, copyright, and optional social links.

copyrightText.note: Copyright text displayed at bottom left

socialLinksRules.note: Optional array of social links. Only renders if provided and has length > 0.

logoRules.note: Uses logoText for SVG text logo via FooterLogo component.

propsSchema.socialLinks?: Array<{ icon: LucideIcon, href: string, ariaLabel: string }> - Social media links

usageExample: <FooterCard logoText="Webild" copyrightText="© 2025 | Webild" socialLinks={[{ icon: Twitter, href: 'https://twitter.com/webild', ariaLabel: 'Twitter' }, { icon: Linkedin, href: 'https://linkedin.com/company/webild', ariaLabel: 'LinkedIn' }]} />
